step_feedback.feedback: Good job closing your fingers into fists and drawing your arms in. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale and extend.
Keep up the good work with the arm extension. Ensure you're exhaling fully and relaxing your muscles.
Your arm movements are looking good. Continue to focus on relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Excellent job completing the repetitions! You're effectively opening your fingers and extending your arms.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your fists, then exhale and relax as you extend your arms. Keep practicing these movements to help with lymph drainage.
